title: [Covert Creatures]
description: Numerous glass-encased bug displays hang from the polished stone walls of the cottage, interspersed with fishing nets holding aquatic specimens.  Arathiel-inset lanterns cast bright light across a silver rack and a copper and velvet mannequin, and a pair of quartz moth statues flank a fuzzy yellow-striped black velvet curtain.  Hiding in the shadows of one corner, a jade butterfly-inset case perches on a tentacle-legged stone table next to a silver-framed parchment.
